Feature Labeling

Labels epochs’ data according to its events.

Inputs

  • Epochs
  • EEGMarker: Markers from widget EEGMarker

Outputs

  • numpy.ndarray: Vector of data
  • numpy.ndarray: Labels of data

Use

Markers - If there are markers on the input, their name will be shown.

Example

Related widgets

EEG Marker
